A comet passed through the milky way galaxy as three pieces seperate 
from its icy body. scans of the galaxy show large amounts of 
Translife on the third  small planet from the sun. A sweeping probe 
shows great potential for organic life on the planet.

The three sections take a direct course for the planet, staying in a 
perfect triangular formation. A voice from the right front asks "Are 
you sure you want this planet father?"

From the larger rear piece a voice is heard to reply "Yes daughter 
this planet will be the perfect place for my experiments."  > >
> >
